title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 179-4.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 179-4.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Subpart is to promote order and
consistent behavioral standards within and between facilities and programs. This purpose is accomplished by establishing clear behavioral expectations for
residents and by requiring consistent enforcement of these behaviors by staff. These behavioral expectations apply to all residents of secure, limited secure, and nonsecure facilities, including community-based facilities and programs, operated by the division. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
179-4.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
